Package com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features

Generic features for use with Talismane machine learning, enabling various logical, mathematical and string manipulation functions in these features.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BooleanFeature<T>
    A feature with a Boolean result.
    DoubleFeature<T>  
    DynamicSourceCodeBuilder<T>
    Builds "flattened" declarative source code for a given feature, and makes it possible to retrieve the declarative version.
    Dynamiser<T>
    Manages the construction of dynamic classes which flatten out the feature structure into declarative code.
    Feature<T,Y>
    A single feature that checks a given object T (e.g.
    FeatureClassContainer
    An interface allowing a class to act as a container for name-to-featureClass maps.
    FeatureParser<T>
    Parses a function descriptor into an actual feature.
    FeatureParserInternal<T>  
    FeatureResult<T>
    An outcome for a given feature.
    FeatureService  
    FeatureWrapper<T,Y>
    A wrapper feature, which simply wraps another feature.
    FunctionDescriptor
    A textual descriptor of a function, used for parsing a list of textual function descriptors.
    FunctionDescriptorParser
    A parser for textual function descriptors.
    If the descriptor contains a double-quote delimited string, this string can contain \" and \\, which will escape " and \.
    HasFeatureCache
    Any context implementing this interface has a feature cache in which to cache features.
    IntegerFeature<T>  
    RuntimeEnvironment
    An environment giving a feature access to any variables that were set during top-level feature initialisation.
    StringCollectionFeature<T>
    A feature that returns a collection of strings, each potentially with a weight.
    StringFeature<T>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCachableFeature<T,Y>
    In addition to AbstractFeature, allows us to cache the feature result in the context to avoid multiple checking, and logs performance.
    AbstractDynamiser<T>  
    AbstractDynamiser.DiagnositicsLogger  
    AbstractFeature<T,Y>
    An Abstract base class for features, basically defining feature equality.
    AbstractFeatureParser<T>
    An abstract base class for feature parsers, which simplifies the parsing by performing reflection on the feature classes corresponding to function names.
    AbstractFeatureParser.RootWrapper<T,Y>  
    AbstractMonitorableFeature<T,Y>
    In addition to AbstractFeature, logs performance.
    AbstractStringCollectionFeature<T>  
    AndFeature<T>
    Combines any number boolean features using a boolean AND.
    AndFeatureAllowNulls<T>
    Combines any number boolean features using a boolean AND.
    BooleanLiteralFeature<T>
    Wrapper for a boolean literal.
    ConcatenateFeature<T>
    Merges two or more string features by concatenating their results and adding a | in between.
    ConcatenateWithNullsFeature<T>
    Merges two or more string features by concatenating their results and adding a | in between.
    DivideOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 / operand2.
    DoubleLiteralFeature<T>
    Wrapper for a double literal.
    EndsWithFeature<T>
    Returns true if the first string feature ends with any of the other string features.
    EqualsOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 == operand2.
    EqualsOperatorForBoolean<T>
    Returns operand1 == operand2.
    EqualsOperatorForDouble<T>
    Returns operand1 == operand2, with an error margin of 0.0001 is allowed.
    EqualsOperatorForInteger<T>
    Returns operand1 == operand2 for two integers.
    EqualsOperatorForString<T>
    Returns operand1 == operand2 for two strings.
    ExternalResourceDoubleFeature<T>
    An external resource feature for an external resource with a double value per key.
    ExternalResourceFeature<T>
    An external resource feature for an external resource with a single class per key.
    FeatureServiceLocator  
    GraduateFeature<T>
    Takes a feature with a value from 0 to 1, and converts it to a graduated value of 0, 1/n, 2/n, 3/n, ..., 1
    GreaterThanIntegerOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 > operand2.
    GreaterThanOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 > operand2.
    GreaterThanOrEqualsIntegerOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 >= operand2.
    GreaterThanOrEqualsOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 >= operand2.
    IfThenElseBooleanFeature<T>
    Mimics an in-then-else structure - if condition is true return thenFeature result, else return elseFeature result.
    IfThenElseDoubleFeature<T>
    Mimics an in-then-else structure - if condition is true return thenFeature result, else return elseFeature result.
    IfThenElseGenericFeature<T,Y>
    Mimics an in-then-else structure - if condition is true return thenFeature result, else return elseFeature result.
    IfThenElseIntegerFeature<T>
    Mimics an in-then-else structure - if condition is true return thenFeature result, else return elseFeature result.
    IfThenElseStringFeature<T>
    Mimics an in-then-else structure - if condition is true return thenFeature result, else return elseFeature result.
    IntegerLiteralFeature<T>
    Wrapper for an integer literal.
    IntegerLiteralFeatureWrapper<T>
    Returns the wrapped literal.
    IntegerToDoubleFeature<T>
    Converts an integer feature to a double feature
    InverseFeature<T>
    Inverts a normalised double feature (whose values go from 0 to 1), giving 1-result.
    IsNullFeature<T>
    Returns true if a feature is null, false otherwise.
    LessThanIntegerOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 < operand2.
    LessThanOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 < operand2.
    LessThanOrEqualsIntegerOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 <= operand2.
    LessThanOrEqualsOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 <= operand2.
    MinusIntegerOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 - operand2.
    MinusOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 - operand2.
    ModuloOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 % operand2.
    MultiplyIntegerOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 * operand2.
    MultiplyOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 * operand2.
    MultivaluedExternalResourceFeature<T>
    An external resource feature for an external resource with multiple classes per key.
    NormaliseFeature<T>
    Changes a numeric feature to a value from 0 to 1, where any value <= minValue is set to 0, and any value >= maxValue is set to 1, and all other values are set to a proportional value between 0 and 1.
    NotEqualsOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 != operand2.
    NotFeature<T>
    Reverses a feature using a boolean NOT.
    NullIfBooleanFeature<T>
    If the condition returns true, return null, else return the result of the feature provided.
    NullIfDoubleFeature<T>
    If the condition returns true, return null, else return the result of the feature provided.
    NullIfGenericFeature<T,Y>
    If the condition returns true, return null, else return the result of the feature provided.
    NullIfIntegerFeature<T>
    If the condition returns true, return null, else return the result of the feature provided.
    NullIfStringFeature<T>
    If the condition returns true, return null, else return the result of the feature provided.
    NullToFalseFeature<T>
    If the wrapped boolean feature returns null, will convert it to a false.
    OnlyTrueFeature<T>
    If the wrapped boolean feature returns false, will convert it to a null.
    OrFeature<T>
    Combines two boolean features using a boolean OR.
    OrFeatureAllowNulls<T>
    Combines two or more boolean features using a boolean OR.
    PlusIntegerOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 + operand2.
    PlusOperator<T>
    Returns operand1 + operand2.
    StartsWithFeature<T>
    Returns true if the first string feature starts with any of the other string features.
    StringInSetFeature<T>
    Returns true if the first string feature is in the set defined by the remaining string features.
    StringLiteralFeature<T>
    Wrapper for a string literal.
    ToStringAllowNullsFeature<T>
    Converts a non-string feature to a string feature.
    ToStringFeature<T>
    Converts a non-string feature to a string feature.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DescriptorSyntaxException
    Occurs when the feature descriptor syntax cannot be parsed.
    FeatureSyntaxException
    Occurs when the feature descriptor syntax cannot be parsed.
    NoConstructorFoundException
    Thrown when a constructor isn't found for the requested feature with the arguments provided.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features Description

Generic features for use with Talismane machine learning, enabling various logical, mathematical and string manipulation functions in these features.
